name: Uninstall Miniconda Globally
description: Completely removes Miniconda from /opt/miniconda and cleans up all configurations.

steps.name: Remove Global PATH Configuration
steps.command: sudo rm -f /etc/profile.d/miniconda.sh && echo 'Removed Miniconda PATH configuration'

steps.name: Verify Uninstallation
steps.command: echo '=== UNINSTALLATION VERIFICATION ===' && echo 'Checking for Miniconda remnants...' && (test -d /opt/miniconda && echo '✗ WARNING: /opt/miniconda still exists!' || echo '✓ /opt/miniconda removed successfully') && (test -f /etc/profile.d/miniconda.sh && echo '✗ WARNING: PATH config still exists!' || echo '✓ PATH config removed successfully') && (test -f miniconda.sh && echo '✗ WARNING: Installer file still exists!' || echo '✓ Installer file removed successfully') && echo '' && echo 'Miniconda uninstallation completed'
